scripts.start: node $(node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir=path.resolve(__dirname,'dist');const file=fs.readdirSync(dir).find(f=>/^app\..*bundle\.js$/.test(f));if(!file){console.error('app bundle not found');process.exit(1);}process.stdout.write(path.join('dist',file));")
